item.title: Teaching
item.description: I am a certified Software Carpentries instructor. All my teaching materials are freely and publicly available. We created a bookdown textbook to accompany the ECOSCOPE workshops. As well, we created educer, a R package to accompany the workshops. Upcoming workshops ¬∂ Statistical models in R, Oct 26 & 28 (1-4pm) - sign up here! Introduction to R and RStudio, Nov 16 (2-4pm) - sign up here! Intermediate R programming, Nov 23 & 25 (1-4pm) - sign up here!
